name: scopophobia - windows and linux
description:
in this game you play a kid who thinks everything is looking at them everywhere he goes. they feel like they are losing there mind. they feel like they are being chased everywhere they go.

this game has no dialog, no music, no sound effects. just pure game. there is a mobile version of the game on itch.io as well: Scopophobia - mobile by Whywhyw123 (itch.io). so if you dont pc just play it online on itch.io. but a warning if your not playing a downloaded version of the game your progress will not be saved.

reset saves instructions- open the games .zip folder then you should see level 1.unlock level 2.unlock and so on. if it doesnt say .unlock it should just say level 1 level 2 level 3 and so on. if you see any one of thos just delete them and your progress should back to normal. 

reset multiply speed, and more spikes- open the games folder then delete the files that say speedX2, 3, or 4 and for the more spikes it should say more_spikes just delete them and your good.
